website_summaries.verdict: Simple and effective rower for those looking to stay fit on a budget.
pros: Provides a sturdy, reliable, and smooth ride every time
Seat and handles are easy on the body
cons: LCD console lacks innovation or extra features

customer_reviews.title: Nice rower but monitor did not work
customer_reviews.text: New,. Seems to work fine, however, the electronic monitor turns on but doesn't sink with the rower. I checked the connection, it appeared normal. It was bought as a birthday gift,. too bad. Repair parts were sent immediately, only a broken plastic clip to hold magnetic sensor. Mechanism is very quiet, but the hard plastic wheels on the seat are noisy, too bad they don't use different material. Nice rower for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rower at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I've used it daily for the last 2 weeks. Ideally the display would not be below the row strap, but for the price this is a great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this rower!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rower! Prior to purchasing I researched rowers for about a week and this was the best one for my needs. I needed something that would be quiet, affordable, easy to assemble, and one that wouldn't take up a lot of space in the house. So glad I purchased this rower! Something the whole family can do :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: No heart monitor
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together! Took me about 45 minutes to 1 hour! I'm loving my rower! Only wish it had a heat rate monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Piece of Equipment!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't want to spend a fortune but wanted a reliable piece of exercise equipment and we have it with this item. My family have all tried it (weights ranging from 95lbs to 250lbs) and there hasn't been any shaking or creaking and it seems very solid and is VERY quiet (which we like). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this machine. Its not one of those high expensive rowers but for the price its quiet and fits perfectly in my apartment. Belt tension seems to work good but time will tell as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Best rower for the price
customer_reviews.text: We use it daily. It is a very nice rower for a very affordable price. We are very happy we made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth work out
customer_reviews.text: Love this simple machine. Rides smooth and really feels like it works all muscle groups. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Worthy

customer_reviews.title: not that great
customer_reviews.text: It is ok, at full eight(top) of the dial for a lightweight cardio work out. The digital display is really bad and not accurate in the least and the overall machine is rather rickety. Probably best for teaching children how to row.
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej Goroch

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Need a new side rail. Mine arrived damaged with a huge gash that interferes with the seat slide. You feel the gash with movement. Would like a replacement part
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Indoor rower
customer_reviews.text: Great rower for the price. Very solid. Glides smoothly. Difficult to get lock washers and screws in by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Lecia M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Great value, fairly easy to assemble, would like a larger display, nice height off floor
customer_reviews.author: barbara s

customer_reviews.title: Just wish it was made right as far as the tension bar ?
customer_reviews.text: There was no tension on the main pulling bar I had to return the the item for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Albert C.

product_meta.title: XTERRA Fitness ERG220 Rower
product_meta.description: Rowing is a tried-and-true way to get one of the best full-body workouts available. Each stroke naturally engages multiple muscle zones, while boosting your heart rate and burning calories. As an impact-free workout, and with the ability to easily control the intensity of the workout, rowing is one of the most accessible additions to any fitness routine. The XTERRA Fitness ERG220 Rower combines a smooth-action dual aluminum track with 8 levels of magnetic resistance which work in tandem to provide a quiet, stable, and realistic rowing experience in the comfort of your home. With a large contoured seat, padded pull handle, pivoting foot pedals, and transport wheels for easy storage, each rower has been designed with comfort and ease of use in mind. The XTERRA Fitness ERG220 Rower is fit with everything you need to start making waves in your workouts today. Features Compact frame design folds up for easy storage or transport when not in use Dual extruded aluminum seat slide rails mounted to a steel frame provides an incredibly smooth and stable motion Large 3. 5” LCD monitor features an easy-to-read console with all the necessary information - clearly displays time, strokes, strokes per minute, distance, calories, scan, and pulse* (chest strap transmitter not included) Raised seat height (13. 5” high) gets you on and off the rower with ease 8 levels of magnetic resistance accessed through a dial resistance knob mounted conveniently right in front of you Weighted flywheel delivers the perfect amount of momentum to simulate real rowing Pivoting foot pedals use a wide adjustable strap for quick and easy sizing with a secure fit Magnetic resistance system is friction-free for smooth, quiet, and maintenance-free operation Large comfort molded seat maximizes comfort and durability Padded handle allows for comfort during long workout sessions Uses 2 AA batteries (included), so no plug-in required Transport wheels allow for easy moving and storage Weight limit: 300 lbs.
